snippet: Fifty years ago, General Motors cast off the tailfinned excesses of its postwar designs and shocked the Paris auto salon by showing a clean, crisp Riviera, which has since become a sought-after classic.
abstract: Buick Riviera shocked the automobile world when it debuted in 1963 by trading in the overchromed excesses of General Motors postwar designs for a taut, crisp look; car, considered a beautiful American design, has since become a sought-after classic.
lead_paragraph: Fifty years ago, General Motors cast off the tailfinned excesses of its postwar designs and shocked the Paris auto salon by showing a clean, crisp Riviera, which has since become a sought-after classic.

headline.seo: The Buick Riviera Is Still Fashionable at 50
headline.main: Riviera, a Clean Break for G.M., Is Still Fashionable at 50
headline.print_headline: Riviera, a Clean Break for G.M., Is Still Fashionable at 50

keywords.value: Buick Division of General Motors Corp
keywords.name: organizations
